opportunities.title: Software Development Internship
opportunities.fullDescription: Join our dynamic development team for a comprehensive 6-month internship program. You'll work on real-world projects using modern technologies including React, Node.js, and cloud platforms. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience while learning from experienced developers in an agile environment.
requirements: Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science or related field
Basic knowledge of JavaScript and web technologies
Familiarity with Git version control
Strong problem-solving skills
Good communication in English
benefits: Possibility of full-time employment after internship

opportunities.title: AI Research Project
opportunities.fullDescription: We are seeking a motivated researcher to collaborate on an innovative AI project focusing on natural language processing and computer vision. This 12-month project involves developing novel algorithms, publishing research papers, and presenting findings at international conferences. Perfect for those looking to advance their research portfolio.
requirements: Master's or PhD student in AI, Machine Learning, or related field
Strong programming skills in Python and deep learning frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
Experience with research methodology
Published papers (preferred but not required)
Ability to work independently and in teams
benefits: Opportunity to publish in top-tier conferences

opportunities.title: Master's Thesis Opportunity
opportunities.fullDescription: Develop your master's thesis on applying data science and machine learning techniques to healthcare challenges. This thesis opportunity involves working with real clinical datasets, developing predictive models, and contributing to improving patient outcomes. You'll receive guidance from experienced supervisors and have access to university resources and healthcare industry partners.
requirements: Enrolled in a Master's program in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field
Strong background in statistics and machine learning
Programming proficiency in Python or R
Interest in healthcare applications
Ability to handle sensitive data ethically

opportunities.title: Full Stack Developer
opportunities.shortDescription: Join our growing team as a full stack developer
opportunities.fullDescription: We're looking for a talented Full Stack Developer to join our fast-growing startup. You'll be working on building scalable web applications, contributing to architectural decisions, and collaborating with a passionate team. This role offers significant growth potential and the opportunity to make a real impact on our product and company direction.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in full stack development
Proficiency in React, Node.js, and databases (SQL/NoSQL)
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Understanding of CI/CD and DevOps practices
Strong problem-solving and communication skills

opportunities.title: UX Design Internship
opportunities.shortDescription: Learn UX design in a fast-paced environment
opportunities.fullDescription: Kickstart your UX design career with our comprehensive internship program. You'll work on real client projects, learn industry-standard tools and methodologies, and develop a professional portfolio. Our experienced designers will mentor you through user research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing processes.
requirements: Currently studying Design, HCI, or related field
Basic knowledge of Figma or similar design tools
Understanding of UX principles
Portfolio showcasing design work (academic projects accepted)
Creative thinking and attention to detail
